question: Which sport's competition is the "China Vs World Challenge"?
explanation: The "China Vs World Challenge" is a table tennis competition. The China vs. World Challenge was an international table tennis competition organised by the Chinese Table Tennis Association (CTTA), the International Table Tennis Federation (ITTF) and Volkswagen. Each "China vs. World Challenge" consist of a two-day team competition in Shanghai between a China and a World all-star teams.
